Build a ladder out of pipes or other materials that can be found on the ground level of the building.
Create a rope bridge using strong vines or ropes from nearby trees or buildings.
Use a large rubber balloon filled with helium or hot air to float up to the top floor.
Develop a helicopter-like device that can be launched from the ground and fly to the top of the skyscraper.
Design a high-tech exoskeleton suit that allows individuals to climb the stairs or use their own power to ascend to the top floor.
